A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t know what personality type hates this movie but it’s strange to me that ratings are so profoundly split between great and horrible – not many in-between. I was pleasantly surprised at how good it was. The frantic survival of the rebellion\, unpredictable plot twists\, and incredible effects\, and cinematography\, and humor make this an excellent movie and on par with Empire Strikes Back. The producers didn’t force Star Wars nostalgia and developed this story well. Someone wrote\, “almost every plot-line was a pointless misdirection”. Yep\, and that’s one of the things that made the movie great!
